spn_marg = marginalize(spn_classification, [1,2])

(0.8995064333685048*((Gaussian(V1|mean=10.626661403069875;stdev=3.0085397666728473) * Gaussian(V2|mean=-1.695830465262374;stdev=4.0247605581958545))) + 0.10049356663149525*((Gaussian(V1|mean=11.156469894506369;stdev=3.270347317192774) * Gaussian(V2|mean=-1.0171931677945858;stdev=4.220530180815811))))
